Name: Fortify
Notes/Description: A staff imbued with healing magic. Recovers HP for all allies within a 5-space radius.

Name: Entrap
Notes/Description: A staff imbued with space-warping magic. Teleports a faraway foe to an adjacent space.

Name: Fracture
Notes/Description: A staff imbued with magic that can break foes.

Name: Rescue
Notes/Description: A staff imbued with space-warping magic. Teleports a faraway ally to an adjacent space.

Name: Warp
Notes/Description: A staff imbued with space-warping magic. Teleports an adjacent ally up to 5 spaces away.

Name: Physic
Notes/Description: A staff imbued with healing magic. Can recover an ally's HP at a distance.

Name: Heal
Notes/Description: A staff imbued with healing magic. Recovers an ally's HP.

Name: Mend
Notes/Description: A staff imbued with healing magic. Recovers a great deal of an ally's HP.

Name: Recover
Notes/Description: A staff imbued with healing magic. Recovers vast amounts of an ally's HP.

Name: Illume
Notes/Description: A staff that magically shines through darkness. Illuminates a 7-space radius (shrinks one space per turn).

Name: Silence
Notes/Description: A staff that prevents foes from using tomes or staves for 1 turn.

Name: Obstruct
Notes/Description: A staff that conjures a mass of ice that makes one space impassable for 1 turn.

Name: Freeze
Notes/Description: A staff that prevents foes from moving for 1 turn.

Name: Rewarp
Notes/Description: A staff imbued with space-warping magic. Teleports the user up to 5 spaces away.

Name: Restore
Notes/Description: A staff that removes status effects on an ally.

Name: Nodus
Notes/Description: A staff imbued with mysterious magic that sets all allies' engage meters to max.
